Course_Section_DefinitionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Course_Section_DefinitionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

validation.validation: Submit course sections that have overlapping date ranges. At least 1 date must overlap between all the sections submitted.
You can't group these course sections, because 1 or more of these sections don't overlap in both time and location.
When you're colocating a Course Section with a published Course Section, their Configuration Options must match.
You can't select canceled course sections for colocation.
You can't remove a published course section from its overlap group if there are active registrations on the course section.
